docs.title: Vindicta API
docs.text:
The unified HTTP gateway for Vindicta services.

Vindicta API provides RESTful endpoints for dice rolling, economy management, and AI predictions — all powered by FastAPI with full OpenAPI documentation.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Async-First — Full async/await support
  • OpenAPI Documented — Auto-generated API docs
  • Type-Safe — Pydantic validation on all endpoints
  • Dependency Injection — Clean service composition

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
# Install
uv pip install git+https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Vindicta-API.git

# Run locally
uvicorn vindicta_api:app --reload

# Access docs
open http://localhost:8000/docs

docs.title: Endpoints
docs.text: Path Method Description /health GET Health check /dice/roll POST Roll dice /economy/balance GET Get credits /oracle/predict POST Get prediction

docs.title: Development Setup
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Vindicta-API.git
cd Vindicta-API
uv venv
uv pip install -e ".[dev]"

docs.title: Current Status
docs.text: Authentication is not yet implemented. All endpoints are currently open.

docs.title: Context
docs.text: This repository requires a programming language for implementation.

docs.title: Decision
docs.text: We adopt Python 3.10+ as the primary language.

docs.title: Rationale
docs.text:
• Vindicta Platform is Python-first
  • Rich ecosystem (FastAPI, pytest, ruff)
  • Native async/await for API operations

docs.title: Alternatives Considered
docs.text: Alternative Decision TypeScript Rejected — different ecosystem Rust Rejected — slower iteration Go Rejected — less expressive

docs.title: Consequences
docs.text:
• All source code uses Python 3.10+
  • Type hints required on all public APIs
